thread.title: Bargain - Review
thread.title_full: Bargain - Review of Hotel du Chemin vert Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kelly T
title: Bargain - Review
text: We stayed here after finding a good deal on groupon for our quick mid week break. Close enough to the metro, rooms were pleasantly decorated and no smaller than more expensive Parisian rooms I've stayed in. Location was handy for central Paris and also for Disney with good connections running from Pete lachaise. Not the most picturesque area but plenty of restaurants and bars in the neighbourhood. Breakfast was excellent and staff friendly, no complaints to be had
